pageProduct.name: Swisse Ultiboost 4 x Strength Wild Fish Oil Concentrate 60 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Swisse Ultiboost Odourless 4 X Strength Wild Fish Oil Concentrate is a premium quality, sustainably sourced formula containing high potency omega-3 fatty acids EPA and DHA to provide anti-inflammatory and joint health support, as well as maintain heart, brain and eye health.

4 X Omega-3: The body cannot produce omega-3 fatty acids, so they must be obtained from the diet. This formula is a natural source of omega-3 fatty acids to support general health and wellbeing. Each capsule contains 4 times more EPA and DHA than a standard 1,000mg fish oil capsule.

Anti-inflammatory & Joint Health: Omega-3 fatty acids have anti-inflammatory properties. Fish oil promotes joint health and reduces mild rheumatic aches and pains.

Heart & Cardiovascular Health: Omega-3 fatty acids support a healthy heart and cardiovascular system. EPA and DHA aid the digestion of fats (triglycerides) and help in the maintenance of healthy blood lipids.

Brain & Nervous System Health: DHA helps support brain and cognitive health, as well as helping to maintain nervous system health and function. The nervous system is the communication centre responsible for sending messages around the body.

Eye Health: High concentrations of DHA are found in the retina of the eye. DHA helps maintain healthy vision and eye health.

Healthy Mood Balance: Fish oil helps support healthy mood balance.

Support During Pregnancy & Breastfeeding: Maternal intake of DHA supports healthy foetal development and normal growth and development in healthy breastfed infants.

Odourless: Free from fishy smell.

Sourced Sustainably & Mercury Tested: The wild fish oil in this product has been sourced sustainably and tested against international standards for heavy metals, such as mercury and lead.

Size: 60 Pack

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare practitioner. Derived from seafood.

Ingredients

EACH CAPSULE CONTAINS:

CONCENTRATED OMEGA-3 TRIGLYCERIDES - FISH 1.8 g

Containing:

Eicosapentaenoic acid (EPA) 720 mg Docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) 480 mg

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:

General Health: One capsule daily.

Eye, Brain & Heart Health: One capsule daily.

Pregnancy Support: One capsule daily.

Healthy Triglyceride Support: Two capsules daily.

Joint Health, Mood Balance & Blood Pressure Support: Three capsules daily.

Or as directed by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25 degrees Celsius. Do not use if cap seal is broken.
